content: {"name": "The Church of God for All Nations", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- They require you to call ahead incase of adverse weather conditions just to make sure they are open and able to hand food, If not a way forward will be provided.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2295 Bouldercrest Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Atlanta", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30316", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.6895438, "longitude": -84.3195357}, "phones": [{"number": "(404) 271-3820", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
